name: CIImageProcessorInput
desc: A container of image data and information for use in a custom image processor.

items.name: var baseAddress: UnsafeRawPointer
items.desc: A pointer to the image data in CPU memory to be processed.

items.name: var metalTexture: MTLTexture?
items.desc: A Metal texture containing the image data to be processed.

items.name: var pixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer?
items.desc: A CoreVideo pixel buffer containing the image data to be processed.

items.name: var surface: IOSurfaceRef
items.desc: An IOSurface object containing the image data to be processed.

items.name: var region: CGRect
items.desc: The area within the input image to be processed.

items.name: var bytesPerRow: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes per row of pixels in the input image data.

items.name: var format: CIFormat
items.desc: The per-pixel data format of the image to be processed.
